name: search_sex_offenders

lastname.description: The last name of the sex offender to search for.

state.description: The state to search within. Default is 'California'.

firstname.description: The first name of the sex offender to search for. Default is 'David'.

lat.description: The latitude for GIS search. Default is 37.

radius.description: The search radius in miles for GIS search. Default is 1 mile.

lng.description: The longitude for GIS search. Default is -122.
